Description:
Detects suspicious process patterns found in logs when CrackMapExec is used

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: HackTool - CrackMapExec Process Patterns
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (((command like '%tasklist /fi %' and command like '%imagename eq lsass.exe%') and (command like '%cmd.exe /c %' or command like '%cmd.exe /r %' or command like '%cmd.exe /k %' or command like '%cmd /c %' or command like '%cmd /r %' or command like '%cmd /k %') and (username like '%authori%' or username like '%autori%')) or (command like '%do rundll32.exe c:\windows\system32\comsvcs.dll, minidump%' and command like '%\windows\temp\%' and command like '% full%' and command like '%%%b%') or (command like '%tasklist /v /fo csv%' and command like '%findstr /i "lsass"%'))
